_header: And as the turtle by contemplacion
_description: Fragment of a poem about longing for eternal life — four lines

GULHun232.First Lines:
…And as the turtile by contemplacionffor syn sorowyng with
                    weymentyng
GULHun232.Last Lines:
Only for loue of thilke eternall lyfeThat lastythe evir and may hawe
                    nowe endyng
GULHun232.Note:
Acephalous. Added by a later hand (fifteenth- to sixteenth-century) to
                    lower margin.
